title: Ewer, ca. 1810
provenance: Cecil Davis, Ltd., London; Phelps Warren, NY 1962
description: Round body on splayed circular foot, tapered neck, scalloped lip with pouring spout, loop handle; sides cut with wide pillar flutes, prism cutting on neck and soiyt abd bekiw ti faceted stem and slightly domed foot, bottom of foot cut with radiating flutes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Ewer, ca. 1810.
ca. 1810. glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-144.
